impersonation.description: Select a user to view the app as them

common.accessDeniedDescription: You don't have permission to access this page. Please contact your administrator if you need access.

vehicleBookings.title: Vehicle Bookings
vehicleBookings.subtitle: Manage your vehicle reservations

vehicleBookings.searchPlaceholder: Search by vehicle, driver, or supplier...

vehicleBookings.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filter to find what you're looking for
vehicleBookings.noPendingApprovalsDescription: All bookings have been approved or there are no bookings awaiting approval
vehicleBookings.noBookedVehiclesDescription: No vehicles are currently waiting to be received
vehicleBookings.noVehiclesInFactoryDescription: No vehicles are currently being offloaded
vehicleBookings.noExitedVehiclesDescription: No vehicles have completed offloading and exited yet

capacity.approachingDescription: {count} boxes remaining before limit is reached.

newBookingForm.title: New Booking
newBookingForm.subtitle: Add a new vehicle booking
newBookingForm.capacityOverrideDescription: This will exceed the daily capacity limit. Do you want to proceed with override?
newBookingForm.systemDisabledMessage: The vehicle booking system is currently disabled. Please contact your administrator.
newBookingForm.approvalRequiredMessage: New vehicle bookings require approval before they can be received.

bookingCard.approvalRejectedMessage: Approval has been rejected for this booking

receiveDialog.title: Receive Vehicle
receiveDialog.description: Enter the actual number of boxes received for {vehicle}

startOffloading.title: Start Offloading
startOffloading.description: Begin the offloading process for this vehicle

completeOffloading.title: Finish Offloading
completeOffloading.description: Record the actual box count and finish offloading

exitDialog.title: Exit Vehicle
exitDialog.description: Mark {vehicle} as exited from the facility

rejectApprovalDialog.title: Reject Booking Approval
rejectApprovalDialog.notesPlaceholder: Explain why this booking is being rejected...
rejectApprovalDialog.warning: This booking will be marked as rejected and will require a new submission.

vehicleBookings.unreceiveConfirm: Are you sure you want to revert vehicle {vehicle} to booked status?
vehicleBookings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete vehicle {vehicle}? This action cannot be undone.

validation.boxCountRequired: Box count must be greater than 0
validation.boxWeightRequired: Box weight must be greater than 0
validation.boxWeightMin: Box weight cannot be less than 1 kg

validation.boxCountRequired: Box count must be greater than 0
validation.boxWeightRequired: Box weight must be greater than 0

rangeStats.bookingsOnDay: {count, plural, =1 {1 booking} other {# bookings}} on this day

productionOutputs.title: Production Outputs
productionOutputs.subtitle: Track daily production
productionOutputs.selectOutputs: Select outputs to create a batch
productionOutputs.differentProductTypes: Selected outputs have different product types

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
profile.name: Name
profile.enabledDescription: You'll receive push notifications for vehicle bookings and system alerts
profile.disabledDescription: Enable push notifications to receive real-time updates
profile.pushNotificationsActiveDescription: You can control which specific notifications you receive using the settings below.
profile.vehicleBookedDescription: Get notified when a vehicle booking is created
profile.vehicleReceivedDescription: Get notified when a vehicle is received at the facility
profile.vehicleOffloadingStartedDescription: Get notified when vehicle offloading process begins
profile.vehicleOffloadingCompletedDescription: Get notified when vehicle offloading process is completed
profile.vehicleExitedDescription: Get notified when a vehicle exits the facility
profile.vehicleApprovedDescription: Get notified when a vehicle booking is approved
profile.vehicleRejectedDescription: Get notified when a vehicle booking is rejected
profile.capacityAlertsDescription: Get notified about capacity limit warnings and status
profile.notificationInfo1: Notification preferences are saved locally on your device
profile.notificationInfo2: You can change these settings at any time
profile.notificationInfo3: Some critical system notifications cannot be disabled
profile.notificationInfo4: Notifications may be delivered via the application or WhatsApp
profile.disableNotificationsDescription: You will no longer receive push notifications for vehicle bookings. You can re-enable them at any time.

suppliers.title: Suppliers
suppliers.subtitle: {count} suppliers available
suppliers.noSuppliersDescription: No suppliers have been added yet

dailyLimit.title: Daily Capacity Limit
dailyLimit.description: Set the maximum number of boxes and tons allowed per day

vehicleBooking.systemToggleDescription: Allow or disable the entire vehicle booking system (e.g., for factory shutdown or maintenance)
vehicleBooking.approvalToggleDescription: New bookings must be approved before they can be received
vehicleBooking.overrideToggleDescription: Allow authorized users to exceed daily capacity limits

confirmDialog.systemEnableMessage: This will activate the vehicle booking system and allow users to create bookings. All vehicle booking features will become available.
confirmDialog.systemDisableMessage: This will disable the entire vehicle booking system. All booking features will be unavailable and dependent features (approval workflow, override permissions) will be automatically disabled.
confirmDialog.approvalEnableMessage: When enabled, all vehicle bookings will require approval before processing. This adds an extra validation step to the booking workflow.
confirmDialog.approvalDisableMessage: When disabled, vehicle bookings will be processed immediately without requiring approval. Users can book vehicles directly.
confirmDialog.overrideEnableMessage: When enabled, authorized users can override daily capacity limits. This provides flexibility for exceptional circumstances.
confirmDialog.overrideDisableMessage: When disabled, daily capacity limits will be strictly enforced. No overrides will be allowed regardless of user permissions.
confirmDialog.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to make this change?

vehicleBookingControls.title: Vehicle Booking Controls

vehicleBookingEnabled.title: Enable Vehicle Booking System
vehicleBookingEnabled.description: Allow or disable the entire vehicle booking system (e.g., for factory shutdown or maintenance)

requireApproval.title: Require Approval Workflow
requireApproval.description: New bookings must be approved before they can be received

allowOverride.title: Allow Capacity Override
allowOverride.description: Allow authorized users to exceed daily capacity limits

vehicleBookingControls.noPermission: You don't have permission to change this setting

moreSettings.title: More Settings Coming Soon
moreSettings.description: Additional configuration options will be available here in future updates

validation.boxLimitMin: Box limit must be at least 1

disableConfirm.title: Disable Notifications?
disableConfirm.description: You will no longer receive notifications for vehicle booking updates.

notifications.bookingsNowOpen: Vehicle bookings are now open! You can create new bookings.
notifications.bookingsNowClosed: Vehicle bookings are now closed. New bookings cannot be created at this time.

welcome.title: Stay Updated in Real-Time
welcome.subtitle: Enable notifications to receive instant updates about your vehicle bookings
welcome.permissionDenied: Notification permission was denied. Please enable it in your browser settings.

banner.message: Enable notifications to stay updated on your vehicle bookings

prompt.title: Install FinsERP
prompt.description: Install this app on your device for quick access and a better experience.

guide.title: Install FinsERP App
guide.description: Follow these simple steps to install FinsERP on your device

iosSteps.step1Detail: Look for the share icon at the bottom of Safari
iosSteps.step2Detail: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'
iosSteps.step3Detail: Confirm to add the app to your home screen

androidSteps.step1Detail: Look for the three dots (⋮) at the top right
androidSteps.step2Detail: Select 'Add to Home screen' or 'Install app'
androidSteps.step3Detail: Confirm to add the app to your home screen

desktopSteps.step1Detail: Look for the install icon in your browser's address bar

bookingStatus.closedDescription: The vehicle booking system has been temporarily disabled. New bookings cannot be created at this time.
bookingStatus.closedReason: This may be due to factory maintenance, capacity limits, or scheduled downtime.
bookingStatus.checkBackLater: Please check back later or contact your administrator for more information.
bookingStatus.openedDescription: The vehicle booking system is active. You can create new bookings.

bills.title: Vehicle Bills
bills.subtitle: All vehicle bill attachments
bills.noBillsDescription: Bill attachments will appear here once uploaded

dialog.completeDescription: Are you sure you want to complete the production run "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

outputs.title: Production Outputs
outputs.subtitle: Outputs recorded for this run
outputs.emptyDescription: Production outputs will appear here once recorded

handover.subtitle: Hand over your shift to the next operator

handover.notesPlaceholder: Any additional notes for the next shift...

empty.description: Get started by creating your first production run

new.title: Start Production Run
new.subtitle: Configure and start a new production run
new.comingSoonDescription: This feature is under development. Soon you will be able to start and manage production runs directly from your mobile device.
new.startImmediatelyDescription: Start the run immediately after creation

validation.sameWarehouse: Source and destination cannot be the same

fishPurchases.title: Fish Purchases
fishPurchases.listDescription: Manage fish purchase bills and transactions
fishPurchases.createDescription: Create a new fish purchase bill

search.placeholder: Search by bill number, vehicle, or supplier...

details.title: Purchase Details
details.description: Enter bill, vehicle and location information

addLocationDialog.title: Add New Location
addLocationDialog.description: Create a new location for fish purchases

items.title: Fish Items
items.description: Add fish species and box weights
items.addBoxWeightsHint: Add individual box weights to calculate totals
items.helpText: Add fish species with box counts and weights. You can add multiple items.
items.incompleteItemsWarning: Please complete all fish items before proceeding. Each item needs species, box count, box weights, and rate.

empty.title: No Fish Purchases
empty.description: Get started by creating your first fish purchase bill

deleteDialog.title: Delete Fish Purchase
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this fish purchase? This action cannot be undone.

validation.itemsRequired: At least one fish item is required
validation.boxCountRequired: Box count must be greater than 0
validation.boxWeightsRequired: At least one box weight is required
validation.weighingEndAfterStart: Weighing end time must be after start time
validation.departureAfterArrival: Departure time must be after arrival time

payment.paymentsPendingInfo: Payments remain in pending status until the purchase is approved. After approval, payments can be processed.
payment.advancePaymentDescription: Advance payments are recorded before approval and remain in pending status. After approval, all remaining payments should be made through the bill document.
payment.addAdvancePaymentDescription: Advance payments are recorded before approval and remain in pending status. After approval, all remaining payments should be made through the bill document.
payment.isAdvancePaymentDescription: Check this box if this payment is being made in advance before the purchase is approved.
payment.selectPaymentAccountDescription: Choose the account used to pay this transaction
